name: Digital PCR Congress
content: Over 600 delegates are expected to attend the SynGen Series UK, representing internationally renowned research & academic institutions, clinical research institutions, healthcare organisations as well as leading global pharmaceutical organisations and biotech companies. Over 20 case studies and presentations within the Digital PCR Congress, focussing on key developments in PCR technologies, the application of novel Digital PCR systems and vital solutions to advance the integration of Digital PCR. The Congress incorporates two streams: > Integrating Digital PCR with technologies such as: NGS, Single Cell Analysis, Genome Editing and Synthetic Biology > Applications of Digital PCR, including Cancer and Infectious Disease Diagnosis Co-located with the hugely successful SynGen Series UK, which includes: > 11th Annual Next Generation Sequencing & Clinical Diagnostics Congress > 7th Annual Single Cell Analysis Congress > 5th Annual Genome Editing Congress > 2nd Annual Synthetic Biology Congress View the Agenda: https://bit.ly/2WK7i0Z
